Job Description:
Itech Solutions -  Management Consulting,  Business Development,  Investment Promotion,  Trade Promotion,  Market Entry,  marketing,  Corporate Services Candidates may apply with their latest Resume in Word document format to: 

Senior Software Developer

Detailed Job Description Role : Senior Software Developer Work Experience : Min 2- 3 yrs BE,  BTech or MCA Technical Skills: 

Mandatory: JSP,  Servlets,  Struts (at least 1 or 2 projects),  AJAX 

 Optional: HTML,  Javascript 

Excellent Knowledge of MySQL Database and PL- SQL 

Basic knowledge of Linux Soft Skills: 

Excellent Communication and Interpersonal Skills (verbal and written) 

 Ability to take larger responsibilities and ownership 

Leadership qualities with ability to train and mentor junior team- members 

Should be Proactive and Self- starter 

Willingness to work on challenging projects under strict deadlines 

Should be Self- motivated and have ability for Self- learning
